title: The Rivalry...
body:
Got this in the loading screen about a month ago and thought it looked pretty badass, so thought I'd share it.


Ignore my east coast ping

replies.body:
"Ignore my east coast ping"

m8 I have 150 constantly 100 is fine

> [{quoted}](name=Xx420n0sc0p3sxX,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bFpEVub0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-27T22:32:39.934+0000)
>
> "Ignore my east coast ping"
> 
> m8 I have 150 constantly 100 is fine

^
I've been play on 100-120 since season one, sure it's not that great but not so bad.


*Sincerely,*

http://www.auplod.com/u/lpodua564a6.png

I wish my ping was 90 still.

Sits at 110
